dialogue.text: As the holy maiden of kamihama i must liberate all magical girls from their fate
i will not tolerate anyone who protest the magius plans why do you protest freedom from our fate as magical girls?
ill eliminate anyone in our way, starting with you
yoo are already troublesome to our mission if you dare hinder the truth of magical girls
Damn it, i cannot let them know... especially Madoka. i need to stop whatever his happening to her.
